github.description: Once more with feeling: a rhizomatic database using immutable delta-crdts as hyperedges in a deleuze

projects.vision:
A database where state is assembled at query-time from immutable
delta-CRDTs. No last-write-wins — concurrent values coexist until
resolved by the query. For systems needing federation, offline-first
sync, or full provenance without central authority.

github.description: Groovy Commutator Visualizer - 1D and 2D Cellular Automata

projects.vision:
Visualize the Groovy Commutator — a measure of non-commutativity in
cellular automata dynamics. When evolve-then-differentiate differs
from differentiate-then-evolve, you're at the edge of chaos. Class IV
territory. The fingerprint of aliveness.
